Package Controller

package Controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    addAppointmentController
    addAppointmentController Creates a new Appointment from a new view that will be displayed in the previous Appointment View.
    addCustomerController
    addCustomerControll This class allows the user to add a customer in the customer View.
    appointmentController
    This class populates the view with all of the appointments on the schedule with buttons to edit, delete, and appointments.
    customerController
    This class shows all of the customers in the view.
    editAppointmentController
    This class allows the user to edit an Appointment in the Appointment list.
    editCustomerController
    This class allows the user to edit a Customer's information in a different view, reflected on the Customer view.
    loginController
    This class shows the login screen where the user can login, clear, or quit the app.
    reportsController
    This class creates three ways to create a report reflecting the information from the Appointment view and/or the Customer view.
